Please check at time of car collection. Definition of a rental period: Each rental day is defined as a period of 24 hours. Example - if a vehicle is collected at 17.00 hours on a Sunday for a period of 7 days this must be returned by 17.00 the following Sunday or this will result in an additional days charge.</Text> </Keyword> <Keyword Code="1" End="2017-01-29" ParagraphNumber="8" Start="2013-01-29"> <Text Language="en">Additional charges: Child seats, GPS, additional drivers, excess reduction, ski racks, winter tyres/equipment, additional insurances, under-age drivers and, in some cases, fuel. These additional charges are payable to Avis at the depot up on car collection</Text> </Keyword> <Keyword Code="2" ParagraphNumber="1"> <Text Language="en">dditional driver: GBP35.00 plus tax per driver, per rental payable locally. British Airways Executive Club members receive 1 free additional driver per rental. Child seats: The law in the UK dictates that all children under the age of 12 must use some form of safety seat, unless they are more than 135cm (4ft 5ins) tall. It is the parent/guardian's responsibility to ensure the correct restraint is used. All charges are payable locally at the depot. A daily charge of GBP8.00 plus vat per seat applies, price is capped at 10 days. Booster cushions (designed for 8-12 year olds dependent on height), have a fixed charge of GBP6.52 plus tax, per rental.General note: Models shown are examples only and may not be available in all locations. The specific make/model in a particular group can not be guaranteed, however it will be a like for like vehicle that is provided. The fleet is subject to change. If you're planning to take your car into another country restrictions may apply, please enquire prior to rental. A daily congestion charge is levied in London, for details please see www.cclondon.com. Depots within the congestion zone have the charge for the 1st day included in the rental. Rental terms, conditions and prices are subject to change without notice and may vary by location. Clients unable to collect vehicles on time should call the Customer Service Number on their documentation. Delivery is not available, vehicles must be collected from depots.GPS: Satellite Navigation System (GPS) can be requested at time of booking but is not guaranteed. If GPS is available then applicable charges will be payable locally upon collection of the vehicle.Maximum rental age: There is no maximum age. Minimum rental age: Minimum rental age is 23 years for most groups. Minimum rental age is 25 years for groups K and N. Young drivers surcharge applies to drivers between 23-25. Cost: GBP11.00 per day plus tax. Maximum 10 days charge. Charges payable locally. Personal Accident Insurance (PAI): This is an optional insurance which provides a specified amount of accidental death and medical cover. In some countries PAI also covers baggage. If you have purchased Travel Insurance, PAI may not be necessary. Please check at the depot when collecting your car.Fuel: The car is provided with a full tank of fuel. The car must be returned full to avoid paying a refuelling charge. A fuel service option may be offered at the counter. Please check at time of car collection. Definition of a rental period: Each rental day is defined as a period of 24 hours. Example - if a vehicle is collected at 17.00 hours on a Sunday for a period of 7 days this must be returned by 17.00 the following Sunday or this will result in an additional days charge.</Text> Language="en">A fuel service option may be offered at the counter. Please check at time of car collection. Definition of a rental period: Each rental day is defined as a period of 24 hours. Example - if a vehicle is collected at 17.00 hours on a Sunday for a period of 7 days this must be returned by 17.00 the following Sunday or this will result in an additional days charge.</Text> </Keyword> <Keyword Code="1" End="2017-01-29" ParagraphNumber="8" Start="2013-01-29"> <Text Language="en">Additional charges: Child seats, GPS, additional drivers, excess reduction, ski racks, winter tyres/equipment, additional insurances, under-age drivers and, in some cases, fuel. These additional charges are payable to Avis at the depot up on car collection</Text> </Keyword> <Keyword Code="2" ParagraphNumber="1"> <Text Language="en">dditional driver: GBP35.00 plus tax per driver, per rental payable locally. British Airways Executive Club members receive 1 free additional driver per rental. Child seats: The law in the UK dictates that all children under the age of 12 must use some form of safety seat, unless they are more than 135cm (4ft 5ins) tall. It is the parent/guardian's responsibility to ensure the correct restraint is used. All charges are payable locally at the depot. A daily charge of GBP8.00 plus vat per seat applies, price is capped at 10 days. Booster cushions (designed for 8-12 year olds dependent on height), have a fixed charge of GBP6.52 plus tax, per rental.General note: Models shown are examples only and may not be available in all locations. The specific make/model in a particular group can not be guaranteed, however it will be a like for like vehicle that is provided. The fleet is subject to change. If you're planning to take your car into another country restrictions may apply, please enquire prior to rental. A daily congestion charge is levied in London, for details please see www.cclondon.com. Depots within the congestion zone have the charge for the 1st day included in the rental. Rental terms, conditions and prices are subject to change without notice and may vary by location. Clients unable to collect vehicles on time should call the Customer Service Number on their documentation. Delivery is not available, vehicles must be collected from depots.GPS: Satellite Navigation System (GPS) can be requested at time of booking but is not guaranteed. If GPS is available then applicable charges will be payable locally upon collection of the vehicle.Maximum rental age: There is no maximum age. Minimum rental age: Minimum rental age is 23 years for most groups. Minimum rental age is 25 years for groups K and N. Young drivers surcharge applies to drivers between 23-25. Cost: GBP11.00 per day plus tax. Maximum 10 days charge. Charges payable locally. Personal Accident Insurance (PAI): This is an optional insurance which provides a specified amount of accidental death and medical cover. In some countries PAI also covers baggage. If you have purchased Travel Insurance, PAI may not be necessary. Please check at the depot when collecting your car.Fuel: The car is provided with a full tank of fuel. The car must be returned full to avoid paying a refuelling charge. A fuel service option may be offered at the counter. Please check at time of car collection. Definition of a rental period: Each rental day is defined as a period of 24 hours. Example - if a vehicle is collected at 17.00 hours on a Sunday for a period of 7 days this must be returned by 17.00 the following Sunday or this will result in an additional days charge.</Text> </Keyword> </Keywords> <OperationSchedules> <OperationSchedule> <OperationTimes> <OperationTime Close="24:00" Open="07:00" Sun="true"/> <OperationTime Close="00:30" Mon="true" Open="07:00"/> <OperationTime Close="00:30" Fri="true" Open="07:00"/> <OperationTime Close="00:30" Open="07:00" Sat="true"/> </OperationTimes> </OperationSchedule> </OperationSchedules> </LocationDetail> </PickUpLocation> <ReturnLocation LocationCode="BCN"> <LocationDetail AtAirport="true" Code="AirBarcelona052" DepotRegion="false" Enabled="true" ExtendedLocationCode="BCN" Name="Barcelona El Prat Airport" OJVehDepotCode="ZI-BCN" PrimaryAirportCode="BCN" Status="" StatusComment=""> <Address Type="2" UseType="9"> <BldgRoom/> <StreetNmbr>43</StreetNmbr> <AddressLine>Aeropuerto De Barcelona</AddressLine> <AddressLine>El Prat</AddressLine> <CityName>Barcelona El Prat Airport</CityName> <PostalCode>08820</PostalCode> <CountryName Code="ES"/> <Position Latitude="41.304699" Longitude="2.09022"/> </Address> <Telephone AreaCityCode="65" CountryAccessCode="32" PhoneNumber="32323" PhoneTechType="1"/> <Telephone AreaCityCode="" CountryAccessCode="" PhoneNumber="" PhoneTechType="3"/> <VehicleVendorSupplier BookingOfficeChannel="ZI_0" Code="ZI" TravelSector=""/> <RelativePositions> <RelativePosition Code="RP" Distance="5" DistanceUnitName="km" IndexPointCode="5" Name="Relative Position Name"/> </RelativePositions> <Keywords> <Keyword Code="3"> <Text Language="en">A fuel service option may be offered at the counter. IndexPointCode="5" Name="Relative Position Name"/> </RelativePositions> <Keywords> <Keyword Code="3"> <Text Language="en">A fuel service option may be offered at the counter. Please check at time of car collection. Definition of a rental period: Each rental day is defined as a period of 24 hours. Example - if a vehicle is collected at 17.00 hours on a Sunday for a period of 7 days this must be returned by 17.00 the following Sunday or this will result in an additional days charge.</Text> </Keyword> <Keyword Code="1" End="2017-01-29" ParagraphNumber="8" Start="2013-01-29"> <Text Language="en">Additional charges: Child seats, GPS, additional drivers, excess reduction, ski racks, winter tyres/equipment, additional insurances, under-age drivers and, in some cases, fuel. These additional charges are payable to Avis at the depot up on car collection</Text> </Keyword> <Keyword Code="2" ParagraphNumber="1"> <Text Language="en">dditional driver: GBP35.00 plus tax per driver, per rental payable locally. British Airways Executive Club members receive 1 free additional driver per rental. Child seats: The law in the UK dictates that all children under the age of 12 must use some form of safety seat, unless they are more than 135cm (4ft 5ins) tall. It is the parent/guardian's responsibility to ensure the correct restraint is used. All charges are payable locally at the depot. A daily charge of GBP8.00 plus vat per seat applies, price is capped at 10 days. Booster cushions (designed for 8-12 year olds dependent on height), have a fixed charge of GBP6.52 plus tax, per rental.General note: Models shown are examples only and may not be available in all locations. The specific make/model in a particular group can not be guaranteed, however it will be a like for like vehicle that is provided. The fleet is subject to change. If you're planning to take your car into another country restrictions may apply, please enquire prior to rental. A daily congestion charge is levied in London, for details please see www.cclondon.com. Depots within the congestion zone have the charge for the 1st day included in the rental. Rental terms, conditions and prices are subject to change without notice and may vary by location. Clients unable to collect vehicles on time should call the Customer Service Number on their documentation. Delivery is not available, vehicles must be collected from depots.GPS: Satellite Navigation System (GPS) can be requested at time of booking but is not guaranteed. If GPS is available then applicable charges will be payable locally upon collection of the vehicle.Maximum rental age: There is no maximum age. Minimum rental age: Minimum rental age is 23 years for most groups. Minimum rental age is 25 years for groups K and N. Young drivers surcharge applies to drivers between 23-25. Cost: GBP11.00 per day plus tax. Maximum 10 days charge. Charges payable locally. Personal Accident Insurance (PAI): This is an optional insurance which provides a specified amount of accidental death and medical cover. In some countries PAI also covers baggage. If you have purchased Travel Insurance, PAI may not be necessary. Please check at the depot when collecting your car.Fuel: The car is provided with a full tank of fuel. The car must be returned full to avoid paying a refuelling charge. A fuel service option may be offered at the counter. Please check at time of car collection. Definition of a rental period: Each rental day is defined as a period of 24 hours. Example - if a vehicle is collected at 17.00 hours on a Sunday for a period of 7 days this must be returned by 17.00 the following Sunday or this will result in an additional days charge.</Text>
